basics.name: Stefan C. A. Werwitzke
basics.label: Mechanical Engineer Student / Programmer
basics.summary: I am a dedicated Mechanical Engineer student, who is passionate about technologies and disruptive innovations. I self-learned programming in my free time, and today is not only a big hobby, but I have also participated in some important programming projects. My programming skills cover a wide range: from Web development to game programming; from microcontroller programming to App development.

work.company: DLR - Deutschen Zentrums für Luft- und Raumfahrt

interests.name: Sports
keywords: Skiing: The freedom and the adrenaline of skiing is something unique to me
Golf: Golf forces me to forget the world, calm down, concentrate and focus in one single point

interests.name: Tech
keywords: Hacking: The challenge to make stuff work how they were not meant to
Rocketry: Since I was a little boy, I used to project, build and launch small amateur rockets with my brother
Coding: I view coding as a form of art. I can think of something, create, and see it working

interests.name: Leisure
keywords: Cooking: Experiments were always fascinating to me, and cooking it's the tasty chemistry
